title: Fabio Giglietto - Festival Internazionale del Giornalismo
snippet: This page mentions Fabio Giglietto as a researcher at the Department of Communication Sciences, Humanities and International Studies at the University of Urbino Carlo Bo where he teaches Social Media Analysis and lists his publications. It references his participation in the International Journalism Festival in previous years.
description: The page on the International Journalism Festival website profiles Fabio Giglietto as a researcher at the University of Urbino Carlo Bo, teaching Social Media Analysis and listing his publications. It also mentions his previous participation in the festival.

title: Il Premio Rimini Mundi a sette ambasciatori del congressuale - lapiazzarimini.it
Advancing Research on Disinformation and Digital Manipulation: The University of Urbino at two Key Conferences in Brazil – vera.ai VERification Assisted by Artificial Intelligence
snippet: This article mentions Fabio Giglietto's presentations at conferences in Brazil in October 2025. He presented research on using large language models to analyze political discourse in hyperpartisan Facebook groups and moderated a roundtable discussion on data access in the DSA era.
description: The article discusses Fabio Giglietto's presentations at conferences in Brazil, where he presented research on using large language models to analyze political discourse and moderated a roundtable discussion on data access in the DSA era, as part of the University of Urbino's involvement.

title: Il movimento religioso cinese che si è infiltrato in un gruppo Facebook urbinate - il Ducato
